content.raw:
I'm building `gazebo9` branch using catkin on Ubuntu 18.04 with no special configs. Each first build after clean runs smoothly, but as soon as CMake re-runs, I’m not able to build gazebo at all. This is what happens:

```
[gazebo:cmake] -- Using system tinyxml.                                                                           
[gazebo:cmake] -- Using system tinyxml2. 
...
[gazebo:cmake] -- Checking for module 'tinyxml2'                                                                  
[gazebo:cmake] --   Found tinyxml2, version 6.0.0  
...
[gazebo:cmake] -- BUILD WARNINGS                                                                                  
[gazebo:cmake] --       OpenAL not found, audio support will be disabled.                                         
[gazebo:cmake] --       Player not found, gazebo plugin for player will not be built.                             
[gazebo:cmake] --       Oculus Rift support will be disabled.                                                     
[gazebo:cmake] --       ronn not found, manpages won't be generated                                               
[gazebo:cmake] --       xsltproc not found. The check_test_ran.py script will cause tests to fail.                
[gazebo:cmake] --       Graphviz not found, Model editor's schematic view will be disabled.                       
[gazebo:cmake] --       OpenSource Virtual Reality (OSVR) support will be disabled.                               
[gazebo:cmake] -- END BUILD WARNINGS                                                                              
[gazebo:cmake]                                                                                                    
[gazebo:cmake] -- Custom CFlags:     -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic -fvisibility=hidden -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -std=c++11
[gazebo:cmake] -- Build Type: RelWithDebInfo                                                                      
[gazebo:cmake] -- Install path: /media/data/gazebo/devel                                                          
[gazebo:cmake] -- tinyxml2_VERSION 6.0.0 >= 6.0.0                                                                 
[gazebo:cmake] -- Configuration successful. Type make to compile gazebo  
...
[gazebo:cmake] CMake Warning (dev) at cmake/GazeboUtils.cmake:99 (add_library):                                   
[gazebo:cmake]   Policy CMP0028 is not set: Double colon in target name means ALIAS or                            
[gazebo:cmake]   IMPORTED target.  Run "cmake --help-policy CMP0028" for policy details.                          
[gazebo:cmake]   Use the cmake_policy command to set the policy and suppress this warning.                        
[gazebo:cmake]                                                                                                    
[gazebo:cmake]   Target "gazebo_ode" links to target "tinyxml2::tinyxml2" but the target was                      
[gazebo:cmake]   not found.  Perhaps a find_package() call is missing for an IMPORTED                             
[gazebo:cmake]   target, or an ALIAS target is missing?                                                           
[gazebo:cmake] Call Stack (most recent call first):                                                               
[gazebo:cmake]   deps/opende/CMakeLists.txt:277 (gz_add_library)                                                  
[gazebo:cmake] This warning is for project developers.  Use -Wno-dev to suppress it.      
... (repeats for hundreds of targets)
[gazebo:make] [  4%] Linking CXX shared library libgazebo_ode.so                                                  
[gazebo:make] cd /media/data/gazebo/build/gazebo/deps/opende && /usr/bin/cmake -E cmake_link_script CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/link.txt --verbose=1
[gazebo:make] /usr/bin/c++ -fPIC      -Wall -Wextra -Wno-long-long -Wno-unused-value -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow -Wswitch-default -Wmissing-include-dirs -pedantic -fvisibility=hidden -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -std=c++11 -DNDEBUG -DdNODEBUG -DdDOUBLE -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -DPIC -DODE_SSE  -g -O2 -mssse3 -msse3 -mfpmath=sse -msse -msse2     -MF -MT -fno-strict-aliasing -DPIC  -shared -Wl,-soname,libgazebo_ode.so.9 -o libgazebo_ode.so.9.10.0 CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/src/array.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/src/box.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/src/capsule.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/src/collision_cylinder_box.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/src/collision_cylinder_plane.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/src/collision_cylinder_sphere.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/src/collision_cylinder_trimesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/src/collision_kernel.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/src/collision_libccd.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/src/collision_trimesh_opcode.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/src/collision_trimesh_plane.cpp.o CMakeFiles/gazebo_ode.dir/src/collision_trimesh_ray.cpp.o /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_system.so /opt/ros/melodic/lib/liboctomap.so.1.9.0 /opt/ros/melodic/lib/liboctomath.so.1.9.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_regex.so -ltinyxml2::tinyxml2 Can anyone help me saving several hours of constant re-building from scratch?
```
